sentences.en: Autumn is also the authentic season of renewal.
sentences.cn: 秋天才是真正的除旧布新的季节.
两种文本具有同等效力.

sentences.en: He wanted an authentic accent of Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 他需要了解林肯的真正口音.

sentences.en: I don't know if the painting is authentic.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这幅画是不是真迹。

sentences.en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
sentences.cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

sentences.en: It is crucial that all documents presented are authentic and easily verifiable.
sentences.cn: 所有提交的文件必须真实且易于查证，这一点很关键。

sentences.en: She has authentic charm whereas most people simply have nice manners.
sentences.cn: 她散发出真正的魅力，而大多数人只是举止优雅。

sentences.en: Such as he had were of distinguished origin and authentic.
sentences.cn: 他所收藏的东西是著名的作品,而且是真品.

sentences.en: The copy he made of the painting can pass for an authentic one.
The girl is an authentic girl. I'll produce her for you if you want.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩很可靠,如果你要见她, 我会带她来给你看看.

sentences.en: The information is authentic for it comes from an authoritative magazine.
sentences.cn: authentic:这些消息是可信的因为它们来自一本权威的杂志.

sentences.en: The next day in the tea - house he got authentic news that the railway was cut.
sentences.cn: 下一天,他从茶馆里得到确实的信息,铁路真个不通了.
它们必须得看上去像真的。

sentences.en: This is an authentic news report.
sentences.cn: 这是篇可靠的新闻报道。

sentences.en: This is an authentic news report. We can depend on it.
sentences.cn: 这是篇可靠的新闻报道, 我们相信它.

trans.tran_cn: 真正的，真诚的，逼真的，可靠的
